## Load Dataset

Dataset consists of 1338 records and 7 features. The column *charges* is the independent variable, the other 6 will be used to analyze their impact to total costs.

```{r}
df <- read.csv(file = 'insurance.csv')
nrow(df)
ncol(df)
head(df)
```
